entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • React to deps.json change wrt PrivateAssets #35265
    10.0.0
  • How do I handle: The Azure Cosmos DB provider for EF Core currently does not support index definitions.' #35264
  • User transaction is not supported with a TransactionSuppressed migrations or a retrying execution strategy Ef core 9 #35263
  • Different behaviour between `Include` and `ThenInclude` when querying self-referencing entities #35262
  • Rename EntityTypeBuilder<TEntity>.HasData(params object[] data) overload #35261
  • How to avoid 'N' being prepended before json path in json_value() function in a user-defined function #35260
  • Why are owned types required to use ToJson feature? #35259
  • Issues with EF Tools (9.0.0) and MS.CodeAnalysis.WorkSpaces.MSBuild (4.8.0) #35258

Closed

  • Support for a Single Project with Multiple Provider Migrations - Edge Case/Issue/Request #34197
  • Regression going from .NET/EF 8 to 9 with CosmosDb, will no longer save/load Ulid and Custom struct types #34936
  • The data types varchar and nvarchar are incompatible in the '^' operator #35093
    9.0.1
  • EF Core 9 : the database operation was expected to affect 1 row(s), but actually affected 0 row(s) #35195

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Don't suppress transactions when creating the history repository #35266
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864

Updated

  • Don't attempt to remove a detached entry from the local view #35253
  • Don't escape separator characters in single key values #35252
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35193
